doc:
Charles Levin (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Levin_(actor) 0 Charles Levin (born March 12, 1949) is an American actor who has appeared in television and movies and on stage. He is best known for the role of Elliot Novak on the series Alice having become a regular in the show's 9th season and the recurring role of Eddie Gregg on Hill Street Blues from 1982 to 1986. Charles_Levin ( born March_12_,_1949 ) is an_American_actor who has_appeared in television_and_movies and on stage .
